"Downloading Blueprints":
"If you want to use another player's Blueprint, you must first visit their Creative Space.

If they have a Blueprint Terminal installed, you can download any Blueprints registered by that player."

"If you want to find popular or officially-distributed <yellow>Blueprints<c>, use the Initial Teleporter and select \"Trending Blueprints\" or \"Official Spaces\" to find some high-profile Blueprints."
